channel.title: Need help making a 32 bit for my client!
channel.description:
Right now people with a 64 bit can only run the client when they download it. I need people who have a 32 bit to be able to run the client aswell. I don't know how to make it so people with a 32 bit can run my client and play. Here is the code I have for my run client right now:
@echo off title Your World Scape Client v1.00 :main cd Files "C:/Program Files (x86)/java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause

item.title: Need help making a 32 bit for my client!
item.dc:creator: @chrisrocks4122 chrisrocks4122
item.description:
@chrisrocks4122 wrote:

so what would the code but if I were to use that? Like the full code?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making a 32 bit for my client!

item.title: Need help making a 32 bit for my client!
item.dc:creator: @chains424 chains424
item.description:
@chains424 wrote:


[b]Change the jre7 to your jdk version[/b]

[b]I am NOT windows 7. I'm actually windows xp so I'll tell you how to get to your JDK using windows xp. Windows 7 shouldn't be much different.[/b]

[b][color=red]My computer>Local Disk I:[this would be Disk C: for you]>Program Files>Java>jdk1.7.0_04[This is my JDK version, yours might be different.]>bin.[/b]

[b]Then copy that directory. For me it would be...[/b]

[code]I:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_04\bin[/code]

[b]But for you, it would be something like this..[/b]

[code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_04\bin[/code]

Then do this...

[code]C:/Program Files/java/jdk1.7.0_04/bin/java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui[/code]
[b]
REMEMBER, your jdk is probably different then mine so dont use that code.[/b]

Change the jre7 to your jdk version

I am NOT windows 7. I’m actually windows xp so I’ll tell you how to get to your JDK using windows xp. Windows 7 shouldn’t be much different.

[color=red]My computer>Local Disk I:[this would be Disk C: for you]>Program Files>Java>jdk1.7.0_04[This is my JDK version, yours might be different.]>bin.

Then copy that directory. For me it would be…

But for you, it would be something like this…

Then do this…


REMEMBER, your jdk is probably different then mine so dont use that code.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making a 32 bit for my client!
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“strpkz, post:3, topic:450549”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=553437.msg4054792#msg4054792 date=1342833872]
Remove the (x86). I have a 32-bit computer. And I believe 64-bit computers have that.
[/quote]
x86 = 32 bit lol[/quote]
yea but 32-bit computers don’t have the Program files(x 86) in the C: drive. That folder is for 32-bit programs in 64-bit computers.

Read full topic

item.description:
@chrisrocks4122 wrote:

Right now people with a 64 bit can only run the client when they download it.
I need people who have a 32 bit to be able to run the client aswell. I don’t know
how to make it so people with a 32 bit can run my client and play. Here is the code
I have for my run client right now:

@echo off
title Your World Scape Client v1.00
:main
cd Files
“C:/Program Files (x86)/java/jre7/bin/java.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
pause
